'''Captain Tatzatl''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Tatzatl leads a crew of exclusively godlike sailors on his ship, the ''Divine Barge'', seeing to their kin across Eora. In his drive to protect them, he has recently abducted [Giacolo](/giacolo/), an animancer who discovered a method to detect godlike in utero - a technology that has the potential to do exquisite harm to the world...

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved =[The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/): Tatzatl leads the group of pirates that abducted [Giacolo](/giacolo/).

## Trivia

* He is voiced by [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0726184/ Sam Riegel].

'''Captain Tatzatl''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Tatzatl leads a crew of exclusively godlike sailors on his ship, the ''Divine Barge'', seeing to their kin across Eora. In his drive to protect them, he has recently abducted [[Giacolo]], an animancer who discovered a method to detect godlike in utero - a technology that has the potential to do exquisite harm to the world...
